cancel.title: Cancel Shift

cancel.cancelAllLabel: Cancel all remaining shifts for this job

cancel.proofRequired: Remember to send medical proof to connect@hypehire.me within 5 working days
cancel.error: Failed to cancel shift. Please try again.
